headlines.description: United States forward Brenden Aaronson scored the opening goal in Leeds United's 3-0 win against Chelsea on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: U.S.'s Aaronson nets as Leeds stun Chelsea 3-0

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at West Ham United

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion maintained their impressive start to the Premier League season with a 2-0 win at West Ham United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton maintain streak with win at West Ham

headlines.description: Manchester City was given a major scare by Newcastle before coming from behind to draw 3-3 in a thrilling Premier League game on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: City bounces back to draw 3-3 at Newcastle in Premier League
